lib/supabase/types.ts.description: The database schema includes a bookings table with status field (pending/accepted/rejected/in_progress/completed/cancelled) that can be used for job applications. There's also a notifications table for user notifications.

app/app/providers/auth-provider.tsx.description: The app uses a React Context provider pattern for authentication with Supabase. The AuthProvider provides user, session, userRole state and signIn/signOut/signUp functions.

lib/supabase/client.ts.description: Supabase client is exported as 'supabase' from lib/supabase/client.ts for browser-side queries. Server client is available in lib/supabase/server.ts using createServerClient.

app/app/(dashboard)/worker/jobs/page.tsx.description: Current dashboard pages are placeholders with static HTML. They display stats cards but have no actual data fetching or interactivity yet.
